title: Revealing Visions
description: From the beginning Janie's life was in turmoil; brought up in a home with abuse and lies. Daniel always did what he felt was in the best interest of his sister, Janie.Rico's love for Janie was never ending; from the first moment he laid eyes on the woman she had become. Malachi was no stranger to heart break. Janie's arrival brought him hope for the future and a hurt he wouldn't soon forget.This is the back story to the Valentine/Petrilo Series characters. See where they came from and what was going on "behind the scenes". This novella will tell all the dirty little secrets that have been left untold... until now.
author: Reyna Hawk
